participant_1.background:
My Impala is the only thing I have to show for my life.
i am a musician.
I love taking care of my curls.
I'm sad because my best friend just moved away.
I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.

participant_2.background:
I prefer to listen to my own music on my own terms.
I have a system for doing laundry that works well for me.
I like to listen to the band Red Hot Chili Peppers to remember my dad.
i volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.
i freeze up in social situations.

content.text: I'm sorry to hear about your best friend. I've been there before and it's definitely tough. What do you think you're going to do to fill the void?
I'm not sure yet. I've been thinking about joining a club or something like that. I'm also trying to spend more time with my family.
That's a good idea. I know it's not the same, but it can help to be around people who care about you.
Yeah, I think so too. I'm also going to try to focus more on my hobbies. I've been neglecting them a lot lately.
That's a great idea. What kind of hobbies do you have?
I like to play guitar, write music, and read. I also like to go hiking and camping.
Those all sound like great hobbies. I'm sure they'll help you to take your mind off of things.
I hope so. I'm going to try my best.
I'm sure you'll be fine. Just remember that you're not alone. There are people who care about you and want to help.
No problem. Feel free to reach out if you need anything.
